The Pierre

TripAdvisor Certificate
of Excellence

The Pierre is rated #14 on TripAdvisor out of 466 New York City hotels. In addition, we have received the 2017 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence, which recognizes establishments that consistently earn great TripAdvisor reviews from travelers. It accounts for the quality, quantity and recency of reviews submitted by travelers over a 12-month period.
